IntroductionÂ¶

pcask1d is a Python package designed to perform toy quantum chemistry calculations in one-dimension. The code is written in an object oriented style. At the centre of the package are the constructions Parameters, Wavefunction, Density, and Hamiltonian. The iterable SCF class uses these constructions to perform a self-consistent calculation.

The physics contained in the package can be found at X.

An introductory user guide (with examples) can be found at Y.
